pageDescription: This is the new SusDoX APP to store your code and view medical examinations.

content.networkErrorScreeningsText:
A network error occurred!
We could not request the medical examinations!
content.authErrorScreeningsText:
Your code is invalid!
We could not request the medical examinations.
content.miscErrorScreeningsText:
A general error occurred!
We could not request the medical examinations!
content.menuPWAInstallSubtext: This does not require additional storage space.
content.logoutmodalMessage:
Please confirm the logout.
The code will be irrevocably deleted from this device.
content.logoutmodalMessageTemplate:
Please confirm the logout of {{{label}}}.

The code will be irrevocably deleted from this device.
content.invalidcodemodalMessage:
The code for this user is invalid! Login with this code is no longer possible.
Do you want to delete this code from your device?
content.invalidcodemodalMessageTemplate:
The code for {{{label}}} is invalid!

Login with this code is no longer possible.
You can ignore this message, delete the code, or update it if you already have a new code.
content.howtoIOSHint: Note: You need to be in Safari.
content.codeverificationMessage: Please confirm with your birth date.
